headline: Schlumberger Limited (SLB): Leading the Charge in Energy and Carbon Management
summary: We recently published a list of 8 Stocks on Jim Cramer’s Radar. In this article, we are going to take a look at where Schlumberger Limited (NYSE:SLB) stands against other stocks on Jim Cramer’s radar.
